results.title: Role of Metformin in the Management of Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome-Associated Acne: A Systematic Review
results.text_hl: Reduction in @<m>DISEASE_Acne_Vulgaris</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000152 @@@acne@@@ after 12 weeks of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use.

citations.NLM: Shamim H, Jean M, Umair M, Muddaloor P, Farinango M, Ansary A, Dakka A, Nazir Z, White CT, Habbal AB, Mohammed L. Role of Metformin in the Management of Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome-Associated Acne: A Systematic Review Cureus. 2022 Aug;14(8):e28462. PMID: 36176868

results.title: Insulin resistance in the course of acne - literature review
results.text_hl: All the data presented have demonstrated the effectiveness of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ as an adjuvant therapy of @<m>DISEASE_Acne_Vulgaris</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000152 @@@acne@@@.

citations.NLM: Sadowska-Przytocka A, Gruszczyńska M, Ostałowska A, Antosik P, Czarnecka-Operacz M, Adamski Z, Łącka K. Insulin resistance in the course of acne - literature review Postepy Dermatol Alergol. 2022 Apr;39(2):231-238. PMID: 35645675

results.title: Biguanides Induce Acute de novo Lipogenesis in Human Primary Sebocytes
results.text_hl: Additionally, after six months of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment to normalize these hormones, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ has shown a beneficial effect on @<m>DISEASE_Acne_Vulgaris</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000152 @@@acne@@@.

citations.NLM: Nicoll J, Buehrer BM. Biguanides Induce Acute de novo Lipogenesis in Human Primary Sebocytes Clin Cosmet Investig Dermatol. 2020;13():197-207. PMID: 32158247

results.title: Insulin Resistance and Acne: The Role of Metformin as Alternative Therapy in Men
results.text_hl: Furthermore, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ can suppress mTORC1 activity and may lead to an improvement in @<m>DISEASE_Acne_Vulgaris</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000152 @@@acne@@@ development and appearance.

citations.NLM: Andreadi A, Muscoli S, Tajmir R, Meloni M, Minasi A, Muscoli C, Ilari S, Mollace V, Della Morte D, Bellia A, Campione E, Di Daniele N, Lauro D. Insulin Resistance and Acne: The Role of Metformin as Alternative Therapy in Men Pharmaceuticals (Basel). 2022 Dec 26;16(1):. PMID: 36678524

results.title: Effects of metformin on experimentally induced acne on rabbit ear.
results.text_hl: Effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on experimentally induced @<m>DISEASE_Acne_Vulgaris</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000152 @@@acne@@@ on @SPECIES_9986 @@@rabbit@@@ ear.

citations.NLM: Kamboj P, Bishnoi A, Handa S, Dutta P, Nahar Saikia U, Pal A, De D. Effects of metformin on experimentally induced acne on rabbit ear. Exp Dermatol. 2021 Jul;30(7):966-972. PMID: 33847400

results.title: A systematic review of the uses of metformin in dermatology.
results.text_hl: There is scope for clinicians to consider @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ as an adjunct therapy in @<m>DISEASE_Acne_Vulgaris</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000152 @@@acne@@@ and @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@.

citations.NLM: Raza S, Al-Niaimi F, Ali FR. A systematic review of the uses of metformin in dermatology. Clin Exp Dermatol. 2023 Feb 2;48(2):73-79. PMID: 36641775

results.title: Comparison of Clinical, Metabolic and Hormonal Effects of Metformin Versus Combined Therapy of Metformin With Myoinositol Plus D-Chiro-Inositol in Women With Polycystic Ovary Syndrome (PCOS): A Randomized Controlled Trial
results.text_hl: Our study has shown a synergistic effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in combination with MI plus DCI in @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@ and @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@insulin resistance@@@ in terms of improvement in cycle irregularity, global @<m>DISEASE_Acne_Vulgaris</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000152 @@@acne@@@ score, LH levels, LH:FSH ratio, @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ profile including @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@, HDL and LDL levels and postprandial @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@.

citations.NLM: Bahadur A, Arora H, Ravi AK, Naithani M, Bahurupi Y, Chaturvedi J, Ajmani M, Mundhra R. Comparison of Clinical, Metabolic and Hormonal Effects of Metformin Versus Combined Therapy of Metformin With Myoinositol Plus D-Chiro-Inositol in Women With Polycystic Ovary Syndrome (PCOS): A Randomized Controlled Trial Cureus. 2021 Jun;13(6):e15510. PMID: 34268040

results.title: Metformin Therapy for Acne in Patients with Polycystic Ovary Syndrome: A Systematic Review and Meta-analysis.
results.text_hl: Presence of @<m>DISEASE_Acne_Vulgaris</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000152 @@@acne@@@ decreased significantly after @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment (OR 0.362; 95% CI 0.271 to 0.485).

citations.NLM: Yen H, Chang YT, Yee FJ, Huang YC. Metformin Therapy for Acne in Patients with Polycystic Ovary Syndrome: A Systematic Review and Meta-analysis. Am J Clin Dermatol. 2021 Jan;22(1):11-23. PMID: 33048332
